title: "Failed to create dump file"
body:
Was in champion select for ranked, get a popup that says "Failed to create dump file: " with I think the numbers were 138? I could be wrong though. Then LoL client crashes, restarts with a spinner and I can hear things going on in champ select in the background but have no UI.... until champ select cancels and then I end up back in the lobby. Now I've got a dodge queue and minus a few lp...

Being a dev myself I understand things happen so I'm not going to be bent out of shape over the timer or lp, but please look into this and fix so it doesn't happen again. Thanks!!!

replies.body: same this has been fucking me up and im starting to get really annoyed have found several threads but no solutions

Having the same problem STILL.
Has anyone been able to resolve this issue???
it happens every 2-4 games regularly.

Happened to me a few minutes ago during a champ select for ranked flex, client screen was not refreshing. I could hear client sounds and "click" on things but i couldn't see anything so i had to force quit and take the dodge penalty. The client opened up a popup that said "failed to create dump file". i've also been getting a lot more bugsplats than normal despite having no connection issues.
I'm having the same issues.  Has happened in both ranked and aram for me. Happens every few games.

Were there any other error messages?  The dump file error can happen when bugsplat fails to get you logs, but there may have been another error about disconnecting from champion select.  Just to be safe, I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just to make sure everything is in order.  Thanks for the heads up!

Also, I didn't appear to have any other network connectivity issues at the time, although admittedly League was the only thing I was really focused on. I was able to close the client afterward and log back in just fine.

No, no other error messages. I could hear the champion select sounds still happening (bans being picked, timer, etc), I just couldn't see them because they were blocked by the spinning loading icon screen.
